about_the_game:
Buying Points for a Game that Conducts Safety Education Based on Realistic Situations with Robocar Poli

1. Unlike typical safety education, it is conducted in VR, providing vivid education.
2. By recreating realistic traffic situations, it offers more effective education.
3. During play, unconscious behavior check data provides a report that can identify the child's tendencies.
4. By solving quizzes to review the previously learned traffic situations, children can learn safety rules.
5. It provides a report to know the child's traffic safety score.

Game Genre
Educational/Functional Game Genre

Initially, functional games focused mainly on military training and promotional activities. However, it has been discovered that functional games can also achieve quick and easy effects in education and therapy. Functional games are designed to offer both fun and learning effects to users based on games. These games are sometimes referred to as edutainment (Education + Entertainment) or edu-games (Education + Game).

Gelten has combined such functional games with VR, which allows for indirect experience of reality, to create VR safety education content for children.

Before starting, please enter your name and contact information. A link and verification code will be sent to the provided KakaoTalk contact. After registering on the website and entering the verification code, you will be able to view the safety education report generated while playing the game. This procedure is optional. If you prefer to skip this step, you may enter any name and number.

short_description: VR Traffic Safety with Polly is an educational program using virtual reality (VR) technology. We provide psychological reports that analyze each child's participation, understanding and responses to identify areas where the child needs further training.
